exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

original: intros Hequiv. apply filter_and. - apply filter_imp with (P := fun x : T => norm (minus (g x) (f x)) < norm (f x)). + intros x H. apply (Rle_trans _ (norm (minus (g x) (f x)) + norm (f x))). * apply norm_triangle. * lra. + apply Hequiv with (eps := 1). - apply filter_imp with (P := fun x : T => norm (minus (f x) (g x)) < norm (g x)). + intros x H. apply (Rle_trans _ (norm (minus (f x) (g x)) + norm (g x))). * apply norm_triangle. * lra. + apply Hequiv with (eps := 1).
